Their smelly flesh waited for her and her lips trembled before she could calm herself. At last she gripped his ankles and pulled his feet down to suck the first two toes in. As when she'd licked them the bitterly sour toe jam made her tongue burn. The intensely strong sweat and odor filled muck dissolved with her saliva around them and pooled in her muzzle.

She could feel the grit scraping under her tongue but it was the awful taste that assaulted her that made her eyes bulge. Hints of it had come from previous licks but they were nothing compared to the full strength of having two full toes in her mouth at once. Freya gagged, as she when she first started, but stamped it down by swallowing hard. The grit made it harder. The terrible texture mixing with that atrocious taste had her drooling as her body tried to expel it.

Amarant didn't say anything so Biggs didn't insist she suck it back in while Freya slobbered heavily as she worked. The first two toes were followed by the next pair. Loud rumbling came from her belly while the smell slowly diminished in the room. The burmecian's face stank of feet and foot dirt as she licked quickly between the big man's large toes.

They each took plenty of sucking. She had to dig her tongue under his blunt nails before he'd let her move on to the next set. When she didn't he pushed them back into her mouth until she did. Freya learned quickly to do it no matter how awful it was. The earthy salty sourness caked onto her lips from the rest of his feet added to it while a heavy dose of rotten vegetation from between one pair of toes mingled with a fat blob of fine mud and sweat.

More tears ran down her cheeks from the puckering sourness the sweaty muck. Freya tried to stop to catch her breath for a minute after finishing the first foot. Amarant pushed a two to each of her nostrils until she gasped for breath and made her continue whether she was ready or not after just a few seconds.
11311122111121222221211.title: Freya's final "client"

choices: Biggs devises a new torture for her.
Biggs makes her drink more scummy water.
113111221111212222212111.content:
*****

Freya stared at the big feet, and saw how much cleaner they looked than when she started. She still felt sick despite the numbness she'd felt earlier. That wore off by the time she finished his feet and she stared up at him as though daring him to do something about it. Her defiance broke a moment later into eye twitching worry when again Biggs held his boot out for her.

He plopped it down in front of Freya, everybody heard a sloshing noise inside. There was already water in it, soaking for who knows how long in the leather and foot cheese and filth that had remained inside. The mage squatted, dramatically holding his nose with one hand under his hood and waving the glass of clean fresh water in front of Freya's muzzle. When she reached for it he pulled it back and suggested she had to ask for it. He held the glass next to the boot and Freya bit her lip for a few seconds. Her fingers dug into her legs and she growled before again managing to control herself.

"May... May I please drink..." She hesitated, fighting herself inside before spitting the rest out. "Drink from your boot!" Not even trying to make it sound like a question.

"Of course. Hold the boot for me, Freya. I would not want to spill it. That's right, lift it up and hold it." Biggs nodded at Freya as she picked up the boot.

She frowned at the water already inside it sloshing around. She wanted so much to push her muzzle into the slow trickle of water when Biggs tilted the glass just a bit. She wanted to clean the gross taste of all those feet out of her mouth. Instead she watched the water dribble slowly into the boot to become tainted. With the water going in, stench came out.

Freya held the boot but tilted her face away as the displaced air wafted up. The rat's eyes watered worse than when she'd licked Biggs' feet the previous night. Her belly rumbled with nausea again from that unwelcome fetid tang hovering under her nose. Her hands shook the longer she had to wait. The water inside the boot sloshed around noisily and Biggs laughed and commented that she must really want ALL the dirt inside.

The glass of water wasn't big, but it took along time, just past a full minute, with the slow pour. Freya's nerves were shot just from waiting. When the glass was at last empty, and the water came up to the ankle of the small mage's boot. He stood back, the rest stepped forward and crowded around.

Freya was again the center of attention, and she didn't like it. She looked at them, then at the boot, then at them. Her eyes closed. Her hands lifted the boot. Her muzzle opened. She sloshed the first gulp into her mouth. The audience clapped and her eyes popped open.

The water was warm. It was gritty, warm, and dirty. Particles floated in it big and small and they coated her tongue and mouth like she had sucked in a dust cloud. The rancid taste she had experienced from the first boot the previous night was back, and stronger. Whatever Biggs had done to make his feet so foul again had enhanced the horrible contents of his boots to new heights of awful. A bit of water dribbled out of her the corners of her mouth when her throat refused to swallow. She was stuck with the mouthful, forced to taste it and swish it around, while trying to force herself to swallow.

Her eyes widened at the dull green color of the water on the floor. A few white chunks of... of something floated in it. On their own those would have been enough to make the rat throw up but she had to be strong. She couldn't fail again and have to suffer MORE. The water in the boot sloshed loudly as her trembling body shook harder. At last her throat convulsed and the water slid down.

Freya felt terrible as it went down. More terrible still when her hands brought the boot up to her lips again. Trying to rush she tilted it back further and tried to guzzle it. Her throat locked up and her eyes bugged. The flavor crawling around her mouth, like stinky aged parmesan cheese soaked in a bowl on the counter overnight with dill pickle juice, mushrooms, and over use up coffee grounds stirred into it. The grit of dirt scrubbing over her tongue made her spit it back out into the boot. Only a little bit managed to trickle down her throat.

She dropped the boot, and curled up, gagging. The boot stayed upright as she dry heaved for several seconds. Again she kept control, but her guts hurt. The burmecian looked sick as she again picked up the boot. Her head swayed when she looked at the audience. She saw Marlene holding Fratley's cocks in one hand and Puck's in the other. Biggs was watching her with unveiled cruel delight. Zidane, the others, they too were enjoying it. The boot lifted again to her lips and again the filth flooded her mouth and left only another couple gulps left in the boot. A lump of something, the size of whole egg yolk bobbed to the top of her mouth. She frozen, limbs stiff, and pressed against it with her tongue. The sour taste of old sweat flooded her mouth tainting the water worse than ever while the object squished and broke up.

Tears ran openly down her cheek as again her throat refused to work. She couldn't open her mouth to spit it out and couldn't swallow. Biggs grinned at her and predicted that she had found the last lump of soured milk he'd had left in the boot. Some of the audience gagged themselves upon hearing it. Freya hit her chest with one hand and finally managed to swallow it. Again she doubled over, curling and heaving. A steam of green dribble from her mouth but she kept it down.

"She is so dedicated to her love of feet, isn't she?" Puck told Fratley as they watched her pick up the boot again.

Her defiant nature made her glare at him and again choke down another wash. The grit filled her mouth with the horrid texture and taste. The odor of old soaked leather came through stronger on this mouthful, the flavor of it came through the foot cheese in a moldy rotting rush. Freya managed to choke it down in a dozen tiny gulps. Her throat continued to stay unwilling to work, though she was forcing it. Her eyes shut halfway at the last chug, some of the grit slipped down right away before she was ready and she coughed the water back out into the boot again. She spluttered for several seconds before recovering. Her audience snickered at her but quieted down when she slammed the boot back to her mouth and swallowed the last of it. The boot slammed again back onto the floor to clapping as she struggled to hold it the water down. Grit was still in her mouth, the awful taste of spoiled leather and sweat and foot scum wouldn't go numb or dead to her senses.

Freya coughed, sending some grit out onto her hand for her to see the greenish black blobs of dirt. She stood up, swaying on her feet and only a hand gripping her wrist stopped her from going to the door. Biggs again had her in his grasp.
113111221111212222212111.title: Freya gets the boot.

choices: The sludge is too much for her.
1131112211112122222121112.content:
*****

"And now, because you put on that amazing show... we have a truly special gift we KNOW you, of all people, will appreciate." He nodded to Zidane.

"We thought we'd get you something nice." He reached down and picked up his shoes, socks still inside of one, while everybody else did the same.

Even the burmecians, though they did not wear shoes, picked up their foot wrappings. Biggs took of his other boot and Freya watched in betrayed horror as Zidane stuffed his socks into the boot. Puck stuffed his foot wrappings after him, with Fratley and Marlene doing the same. Socks from all around the room were pushed into the boot one after another. Then Vivi came in holding a large glass of water and sipping at it.

He seemed surprised when Zidane took the glass from him, exclaiming that it was his. The smallest mage was even more surprised when the genome poured it into his right shoe. Zidane swished it around, then poured that shoe into his left shoe. He swished that too around. A dwarf sat down and opened his boot front. Zidane poured the water from his shoe, into that boot.

Freya stared, her head was shaking back and forth... no. No, she repeated in her head over and over. Her legs gave out when the dwarf sloshed the dirty water in his boot back and forth, washing over the boot and his well licked foot. He tipped that boot so the water poured into the next. The water was brownish as it poured out out into the next boot. The water was darker still as it poured into the next. Then the next.

Each person stood in front of Freya with their shoe so she could watch the water being poured in and sloshed around. Bits of foot debris and shoe fluff and random dirt floated and shone in the increasingly murky water. Every new shoe or boot brought at least a few floaters. Every new shoe or boot darkened the water a bit more. Freya's eyes followed each bit of footwear. Her eyes darted back to Biggs' boot, overflowing with smelly overused socks and foot bindings.

Her head shook no still. She couldn't cry, though. She couldn't do anything but watch and beg them no, silently. Fratley looked disappointed when he had no shoe, he took Biggs' now empty boot on a whim and held it up for his turn instead.

He smiled to Freya, holding it up so she could see as though he believed she really did like it. Her lover gave the boot a firm shake then poured it into Zidane's shoe, which Puck had picked up. Puck poured that into Zidane's other shoe that Marlene held. The cleyran smirked at the other rat woman, still on her knees and obviously miserable. Guest after Guest filled their shoes in a long train of water in, slosh, water out to the next until finally the last black mage poured the water from his boot into Biggs'.

The water was dark black as it filtered through the socks. It had to be poured slowly to give it time to soak through all the smelly cloth filling that boot. Everybody came over to hold their shoes and boots over it to let the final drips that had gathered pour out and into it. Freya's head sagged with her shoulders as the last bit soaked in. The stench rising from that boot made her retch again.

Her eyes shut as another glass of water passed from boot to boot. From shoe to shoe, to the big smelly boot in the middle. Then another glass. The socks inside soaked up some of it, but most sank through to mix all their fetid feet together into a thick foot soup. The black of the dirt sank down by the time the last drips splashed in.

Biggs' boot was set in front of her, the socks dark and black inside. She looked up at everyone then at the boot. They again cheered when she picked it up. They clapped as it was lifted to her lips. The odor burned her eyes but she couldn't look away from the black scum on the top of the boot. Somehow Puck's and Fratley's foot bindings were on top. She shook her head no again as she tilted the boot and nothing came out for several seconds. A drip formed slowly, she watched the cloth darken with liquid, then the boot was pulled away.

Freya stared at Biggs confused as the small mage shook his head. "I'm so sorry, Freya. It seems I forgot a pair of boots..." He tilted Amarant's boots up, the socks still inside of them, and calmly tilted his boot into the first. "There... Much better."

Freya took deep breaths to calm herself. She watched Biggs dump the blackish water out. Bits of white floated in the black and she morbidly wondered how it got through all the socks. The socks themselves he kept from pouring out with finger on them. When most of the water was out he dumped the socks into Amarant's other boot. Both of them were bigger than Biggs' own large boots, and equally as nasty inside.

Biggs shook the fetid water around in the first and finally dumped that, slowly, into the final big boot. Freya's sensitive ears caught a faint fizzing inside from dissolving foot scum and sweat and grit shifting around. The water splashed only a few drops out of the boot and she was disgusted at herself for being so grateful for even that little favor. At last Amarant's sock slid out into the other boot to join the others and Biggs picked up the final boot to hand to her.

Freya closed her eyes as she again tilted it, this time without looking at the black foot soup, and poured some into her mouth. The musky bitter and above all salty tang filled her mouth and a cold sweat built on her whole body. The grit was surprisingly low at first, but was more than made up for by the unbearable taste of putrid feet.

All their odors and sweat and dirt combined into that one abominable flavor of moldy cheese spoiled cabbage, and mushroom-like earthiness. Her throat gave up, after a brief struggle to prevent swallowing, and let it slide down to her belly. Nausea wracked her middle, her arm shook, but Freya held the boot up over her mouth letting the trickle of liquid dirty feet and shoe scum flood her mouth with the mind numbing mix.

The black water coated her tongue like a cream forcing her to savor the musky sweaty foot cheese more intensely than ever. Her palate didn't have any way to describe the awful mixture, it just told her to get it away whatever it took. Freya turned deathly pale as she swallowed more and felt the gritty lumps and floaters.

She couldn't swallow fast enough to not taste it and had to set the boot down before she forced it all back up. After a few seconds of choking and struggling to hold it down, she tried again with a slighter tilt to see if a smaller amount could be downed easier. The slower drain of water made it worse. The less liquid that flowed in meant more on her tongue and less untasted which spreading the vileness throughout her senses more effectively.

Tilting it further made a stream of gritty liquid escape from under the foot bindings in what felt like runny batter slopping into her muzzle. Her ears and tail stiffened, a musky sweetness, somehow worse than bitterly sour, coated her tongue and entire inner muzzle. The grit stuck to her teeth. The chunks broke up and bounced against her tongue. Worse, she had to feel those chunks and that grit dragging along her throat and down all the way to her gut. Freya dropped the boot and darted up and out to the garbage can.

Bending over it, dry heaving, she wanted it out of her. Her body needed it out. But her throat locked up and wouldn't let it back into her mouth even to get it out of her for good. The rat slumped back for several seconds, then heaved again. Again her nausea couldn't push it out and she staggered back to look at everyone in a dazed glare. The boot had landed flat and stood straight ready for her to continue.
1131112211112122222121112.title: Biggs makes her drink more scummy water.

choices: Freya begs for it to end,
11311122111121222221211122.content:
*****

Amarant and Biggs both smiled at her and looked from her to the boot. Freya dropped to her knees, swaying a bit, and gripped the massive thing. Her arms shook slightly as she lifted it, tilted it, slopped more into her mouth. A sock slithered out and splattered onto her muzzle splashing the murky sludge filled water into her face. The burmecian ignored it, the stench, the greasy feeling of the water soaking into her fur.

Instead she focused on fighting to swallow more of the liquid. She coughed out a lump of sock fluff. She chewed through a wad of muddy grit, releasing the pent up remains of shed toe jam and sweat. Again she lurched away, but stopped a moment later and instead breathed deeply. The smelly water wafted up to her nostrils and she shook her muzzle to get the sock off of it, which fell back into the boot.

Freya needed to finish, but there was so much water left. Her throat was constricting constantly, the pressure from her body trying to throw up the mess competed painfully against her attempts at swallowing. She set the boot down and hurried over to the can again. The pressure managed to force it out at last and she hated it worse coming up than going down. All the grit, the chunks, the smell, the taste... stayed where they were.

Only a bit of the water came out with the grit and scum plugging her up and hurting as it prevented any more from coming out. A tiny bit of the pressure eased but the rest, the part she needed to remove, stayed down. The rat turned away, then jerked back with her eyes gaping wide. Her belly heaved hard and the grit finally passed through to wash over her tongue. Feeling the the pressure release was so wonderful. Feeling the grit and chunks she'd swallowed and tasting them again was so awful. The heaves stayed for three, then four, then five hard clenches before it all finished and left her with a fresh memory of all the feet she'd licked clean. Freya stumble back to find Biggs standing next to the boot.

"Sorry, Freya, you have to hold it all down. Let's begin again. Everybody Please hold a foot around the boot." He lifted his black foot up, as did everybody after a bit of shuffling forward and positioning.

Biggs let go a low level fire spell, heating the air around their feet to a near blistering heat. Some complained, others just grunted, it really was very hot, at first, but eased into an intense then just a sweaty, steamy, heat. Beads of sweat escaped their pores and Freya watched Biggs add a weak wind spell to gather the sweat and guide it into Amarant's boot. Each small sweat ball dropped in without a splash and slowly the level rose back to where it had started before it had been before.

The fresh sweat came from all over their feet. Between their toes, their arches, heels, even just under their claws or nails. While Freya had licked all over each of their feet, the sweat still kept it's essence of salt and sour. Freya hung her head after watching a minute. She felt a powerful urge to throw more up but her belly was pretty much empty.

It took a few minutes for them all to finish. One foot for everybody sweated heavily into the boot and Freya looked down as it was scooted next to her again. The sloshing murky fluid sounded the same as before and looked the same though a saturated sock stared back at her instead of Fratley's foot wrappings.

She took it without thinking of anything except not wanting to drink any more, and lifted it to her muzzle. The fresh sweat had started off fairly clear and had stayed that way even after being set

into the boot. When she tilted it though, the murky leftover water floated up and visibly streamed into the clearer pure sweat. Freya tilted it further, hoping to get the sweat before the dirt.

Her hopes that the sweat would be slightly better than the dirty were dashed as soon as the first streamer of dirt tainted it. The sweat was salty but even with her first gulp mostly sweat the horrid mushroomy earthiness had already invaded and tainted it. The dirt taste, the aged sweat and mud, was nearly as strong as before. It was worse, though, as the sour fresh sweat was too salty and enhanced the flavor of that dirt. The leftover bile and scum from her throw up also washed over her tongue, along with the grit that had caught in her teeth from behind.

Freya's lower jaw trembled with her strain to swallow. The intense foot odor from the water and socks and boot filled her nose adding its own subtle piquant to her sense of taste. She could taste the natural musk of the dozen people all mixed together more clearly with her nose adding to the overly bitter flavor.

She set the boot down, shut her eyes and swallowed hard three times before it all went down. Again Freya lifted it, tilted it back, felt the not quite black water and sweat mix flow out into her mouth. A strong leather tang hit her first. A once white lump of soaked sock fluff stuck to her teeth for a moment then slipped down with the rest.

Her tail stiffened and her gulp of raw foot and boot wash halted. She swished the crud around in her mouth, trying to chew the lump into a small enough piece to swallow but it wouldn't break up. The rat's eyes watered from both having to swallow the lump more or less whole and having swished the water in her mouth for several seconds without realizing it.

Freya coughed after swallowing and the fluff ball landed back into her mouth. She started to spit it out but Biggs leaned down again and stared at her. The burmecian glared at him, some of her fire coming back into her eyes and she jerked the boot back up and chugged three mouthfuls down.

Tears streamed out of her eyes. Her ears wilted. The boot lowered with a sock still in her mouth. Her hands were very steady as she pulled the sock out and let it drop back into the boot. A lump of mud was stuck to her upper lip, but she pushed it into her mouth after dropping the sock. Her fur looked lighter than before. She'd gone very pale. Her mouth opened to lick her lips and a bit of grit was visibly stuck to it.

Again the boot lifted. Her breath coming in choked gasps. She pressed the foul leather edge in and tilted further. The socks all let loose and slid out to cover her muzzle. The thickest of the muck and cheesy foot mud slid, then plopped out onto her muzzle into her open mouth. Freya let out a high pitched whine. Her tongue was buried in the thick slurry.

A dribble of water ran out from the socks down and around her muzzle. They were still in the boot, but only just. If she pulled her nose out of that foot reeking hole they would have fallen out. She couldn't lower the boot to put them back as she needed the trickle of moisture to wash the sludge down. Her tongue couldn't push hard enough to get all the grit, sock fluff, shoe chunks, and mud down. It felt like she had a mouthful of sand that had been soaked in feta cheese mixed with a hint of mustard and overly generous fish sauce overnight.

The audience heard her slurping desperately at the water leaking out of the socks. They saw her throat swallowing constantly. Biggs and Amarant saw she was going to finish the boot when she finished swallowing. Fratley saw she was having trouble and leaned down to slap her back heartily.

Freya's eyes rolled back. Her face contorted. A loud hurking noise escaped her throat and she dropped the boot. The socks splattered onto the ground, the grit spit out of her mouth to make a wet splat onto the ground. She gagged and held her belly again shaking her head no as it tried to expel the awful mixture of fresh sweat and old tainted sweaty water.

She looked up at Biggs. He shook his head and picked up the socks one by one with his toes. Each one he dropped back into Amarant's boot, the one she hadn't drank from. They made wet splats and squishing noises when they landed on top of each other and he mostly ignored her as he picked them up.
11311122111121222221211122.title: Take 2

choices: Her comrads continue to abuse her.
113111221111212222212111222.content:
*****

Freya shook her head again, staring dumbly at him before he turned to her. "You know you have to take it ALL down, Freya. Once more... from the top. Feet up, everybody. We'll have to refill it all the way this time so will have to use both feet."

Another fire and wind spell. Another few minutes of watching their feet sweat constantly. Freya sat with her face next to the boot watching and smelling the the mostly clean but rapidly sweating feet. Amarant tapped his chin, his feet sweating profusely, and stared at Freya.

"Freya, I think you should join the fun too. Go on, lift your feet up too, I'm not sure we'll have enough otherwise." The big red haired man told her.

Freya looked down at her still wrapped feet then back at him and his bare feet sweating over the boot. She was too sick to think clearly and at least she wasn't having to drink it for that much longer. After quickly unwrapping her feet and lifted them into the heat. A gasp escaped her throat from the heat but she recovered quickly. The wind spread the heat around them, a few days travel worth of sweat and dirt was soaked in sweat and washed off into the boot after just a couple minutes.

The heat felt good near the end but abruptly ended with everyone but her pulling their feet away. It was only when she saw them staring at her that she realized she'd just made the boot more smelly. She may as well have licked her own feet too, Freya thought bitterly to herself.

The boot sat in front of her, the socks clearly visible through the much less dark but still cloudy sweat. The fresh batch of foot wash didn't reek as badly, but she could still smell it. It smelled more of too many feet than dirt though. She wasn't sure if that was good or bad and hoped she wasn't smelling her own as she'd added a lot of sweat with the rest.

Freya grabbed the boot and lifted it again. Her muzzle slipped in and she hated how familiar the feeling of lifting a boot to her lips had become. The sweat looked like water, but the texture was different. The saltiness and excessive musk made it seem thinner while the heat of it spread the nasty bitterness over her tongue better. While she'd already swallowed much of the dirt, the sweat leeched more out of the socks. Her own feet had added some as well to make the taste just as pungent if, thankfully, less gritty.

Knowing that it was pure sweat as the first mouthful traveled down her throat made it less pleasant though. She'd sort of gotten used to the grit, but pure sweat, that was almost as bad as if they'd spit into the boot. Freya wished she hadn't thought that. She pictured it, the strong foot taste strengthened, she felt what wasn't there and she had to set it down and stare at the cloudy sweat to prove it was just that.

The others watched her, still swallowing though she'd already finished the mouthful. Her bleary eyes stared hard at the boot for several seconds before she got the courage to pick it up again. It was still overly warm. She hated warm drinks, more so with the foot sweat bitterness than ever. Her muzzle opened again and the rat poured a hard long chug in. Her tongue was bathed in it, but it passed through easier with the speed gulping.

As with before her stomach tried to rebel. A wave of nausea spasmed from her guts up with the pressure of it trying to push back out straining her throat. All the sweat and foot musk, the taste and stink still filling her senses from nostrils to tongue to how the dirt felt in her fur, were making her fight herself.

Freya was grateful for the leather taste after it surfaced again. That familiar, relatively safe flavor was something she could focus on. Her guts calmed a bit and she took several deep breaths before lifting it for another hefty chug. A sock slid into her mouth but she didn't stop. More sock pressed against her nose, flopped over her muzzle. Foot and leather and overly aged sweat blocked out everything. Everything but the taste. She cried again at having to swallow, at having to spit some out to get the filthy sock out of her mouth.

The boot dropped, the socks splashed back in, though no drops came out. Freya doubled over, groaning in discomfort and disgust. Some grit had back washed out of the toe of the boot and with it some sludge. The earthy mud was back mixing with the pure sweat. She knew she had another mouthful, possibly two left, but she didn't want to drink them so badly.

Her ears drooped as she tasted her own breath. The musky mix of sweat and sock filth and the old sweaty dirt before was coming back on the after taste. Her hand hit the floor. If she didn't drink it she had to taste it. If she did drink it she had to, it wasn't fair!

Freya glared around the room as though daring anybody to pat her again, then grabbed the boot and tipped it up. Her throat worked hard as the foul taste and texture filled her muzzle. She chugged hard, not noticing a sock sliding partially down with the last of the sweat until she slammed the empty boot down onto the floor. She knelt, staring down, with a brown sock dangling from the side of her muzzle like a long noodle. The burmecian's eyes stared straight ahead, trying not to think about what was in her mouth while she kept swallowing to get the last of the cloudy sweat down.

Her belly gurgled, full from two boot loads of water and sweat and dirt. She cough and coughed again, then tugged the sock out of her throat. The crowd watched closely, wondering if she could keep it down. Freya hugged her legs to her chest as she coughed again, but held it down.

Biggs lifted the boot and swished it, seeming disappointed that there wasn't any liquid. "Very good... but you still need to wring the socks out. Or suck the sweat out of them."

She glared at him and grabbed the socks in one mass. Her hands tightened powerfully about them while holding them over her head. The rat let the wrung out dirty sweat pour into her mouth, though some of it washed down her cheek and chest, soaking her clothing.

Amarant, Biggs, and the rest of the crowd watched, amazed at her blatant acceptance of one more attempt to make her screw up. Freya gagged and choked, not expecting so much of the bitter liquid to come out. She swallowed hard and fast, then threw the socks down and staggered to the doorway. With one last bleary eyed glare at them she hurried out

Zidane and the rest of his gang gathered their shoes and socks quickly and ran off after her. They caught her before she climbed into a stream. The genome tapped her arm to get her attention just before she reached it.

"I'm sorry Freya... but we have to get going. There's no time to clean up until we get the mage's agreement to join us back to the base." He hauled on her, hiding his amusement as he saw her expression at learning she can't clean her dirty and foot smelling fur off.
113111221111212222212111222.title: Third time's the charm

choices: They take her to some new horror.
1131112211112122222121112222.content:
*****

"Come on, Freya, We're in a hurry!" Zidane called to the lagging burmecian.

Freya panted hard and held her still full stomach. Running had been a chore for her and she was too winded to yell anything back. They hadn't stopped for a rest or even let her near the only canteen they brought with them. Two hours of hiking and running combined with a night of no sleep and foot sluttery had taken their toll on her stamina and she was grateful to see they were at the chocobo forest. Riding would at least let her have a chance to clean up.

Zidane, Vivi, and Amarant all arrived nearly two minutes before Freya. They used that time creatively. Each took a drink, emptying the canteen, and then fetched their mounts. Vivi knew what the others had in mind. He wasn't sure about it, but decided to go along with them anyway. It HAD been kind of fun watching earlier.
